title: Privacy Policy | Praevius
text:
Overview
Praevius (‚Äúwe‚Äù, ‚Äúour‚Äù, ‚Äúus‚Äù) is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use praevius.app.

title: Privacy Policy | Praevius
text:
Information We Collect

Information You Provide

Account Information: Name, email address, company name, job title
Billing Information: Payment details (processed securely via Stripe)
Project Data: Cost data, budgets, variations, and other construction information you enter
Communications: Messages, support requests, and feedback



Information Collected Automatically

Usage Data: Features used, pages visited, time spent
Device Information: Browser type, operating system, device type
Log Data: IP address, access times, referral URLs

title: Privacy Policy | Praevius
text:
How We Use Your Information
We use your information to:

Provide and improve our services
Process payments and manage subscriptions
Send service-related communications
Provide customer support
Analyse usage patterns to improve the platform
Comply with legal obligations

title: Privacy Policy | Praevius
text:
Data Security
We implement industry-standard security measures including:

Encryption in transit (TLS 1.3)
Encryption at rest (AES-256)
Regular security audits
Access controls and authentication
Secure data centres (EU/UK based)

title: Privacy Policy | Praevius
text:
Data Retention
We retain your data for as long as your account is active. Upon account deletion:

Account data: Deleted within 30 days
Backup data: Deleted within 90 days
Anonymised analytics: May be retained indefinitely

title: Privacy Policy | Praevius
text:
Your Rights
Under GDPR and UK Data Protection Act 2018, you have the right to:

Access your personal data
Rectify inaccurate data
Erase your data (‚Äúright to be forgotten‚Äù)
Restrict processing
Data portability
Object to processing

To exercise these rights, contact us at info@praevius.app.

title: Privacy Policy | Praevius
text:
Third-Party Services
We use the following third-party services:

Stripe: Payment processing
AWS/GCP: Cloud infrastructure
Analytics: Usage analytics (anonymised)

title: Privacy Policy | Praevius
text:
Cookies
We use essential cookies for authentication and session management. Optional analytics cookies require your consent.

title: Privacy Policy | Praevius
text:
Changes to This Policy
We may update this policy periodically. Significant changes will be communicated via email or in-app notification.

title: Privacy Policy | Praevius
text:
Contact Us
For privacy-related questions:
Email: info@praevius.app

Praevius is part of the BIM Takeoff ecosystem.

title: Terms of Service | Praevius
text:
1. Agreement to Terms
By accessing or using Praevius (praevius.app), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access the service.

title: Terms of Service | Praevius
text:
2. Description of Service
Praevius is a cloud-based cost control platform for construction professionals. The service includes:

Real-time budget tracking
AI-powered reporting
Variance analysis
Integration with third-party services
Data storage and export

title: Terms of Service | Praevius
text:
3. Account Terms

You must be 18 years or older to use this service
You must provide accurate and complete information
You are responsible for maintaining account security
One person or legal entity per account
You may not use the service for illegal purposes

title: Terms of Service | Praevius
text:
4. Payment Terms

Prices are in USD unless otherwise stated
Subscriptions are billed monthly or annually
Payment is due at the start of each billing period
Refunds are available within 30 days of initial purchase
We reserve the right to change pricing with 30 days notice

title: Terms of Service | Praevius
text:
5. Data Ownership

You retain ownership of all data you input into Praevius
You grant us license to process your data to provide the service
We may use anonymised, aggregated data for analytics
You can export your data at any time
Upon account termination, your data will be deleted per our Privacy Policy

title: Terms of Service | Praevius
text:
6. Acceptable Use
You agree not to:

Violate any laws or regulations
Upload malicious code or attempt to breach security
Resell or redistribute the service without permission
Use automated systems to access the service beyond normal usage
Interfere with other users‚Äô access to the service

title: Terms of Service | Praevius
text:
7. Intellectual Property

Praevius and its content are protected by copyright and trademark
You may not copy, modify, or distribute our software
Feedback you provide may be used to improve the service

title: Terms of Service | Praevius
text:
8. Third-Party Integrations

We provide integrations with third-party services (Xero, QuickBooks, etc.)
These integrations are subject to their own terms of service
We are not responsible for third-party service availability or changes

title: Terms of Service | Praevius
text:
9. Disclaimer of Warranties
THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED ‚ÄúAS IS‚Äù WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND. WE DO NOT GUARANTEE:

Uninterrupted or error-free service
Accuracy of AI-generated reports
Compatibility with all systems
That the service will meet all your requirements

title: Terms of Service | Praevius
text:
10. Limitation of Liability
TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, PRAEVIUS SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR:

Indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
Loss of profits, data, or business opportunities
Damages exceeding the amount paid in the preceding 12 months

title: Terms of Service | Praevius
text:
11. Indemnification
You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Praevius from any claims arising from your use of the service or violation of these terms.

title: Terms of Service | Praevius
text:
12. Changes to Terms
We may modify these terms at any time. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance. Material changes will be communicated via email.

title: Terms of Service | Praevius
text:
13. Termination

You may cancel your subscription at any time
We may terminate accounts for violation of these terms
Upon termination, your access will end and data will be deleted per our retention policy

title: Terms of Service | Praevius
text:
14. Governing Law
These terms are governed by the laws of England and Wales. Disputes shall be resolved in the courts of England and Wales.

title: Terms of Service | Praevius
text:
15. Contact
For questions about these terms:
Email: info@praevius.app

Praevius is part of the BIM Takeoff ecosystem.

title: Praevius | AI-Powered Construction Cost Control Software
text:
AI-Powered Construction Cost Control: See Costs Before They Spiral

AI-powered cost control for construction. Just ask.No training. No manuals. Professional-grade insights.


 Start Free Trial See How It Works








The Cost Overrun Crisis




 88% Error Rate


Construction spreadsheets contain costly errors. Manual tracking means missed variances and budget overruns discovered too late.




 Hours Wasted


Billing cycles require hunting through spreadsheets and PDFs, re-keying numbers, comparing line items manually.




 Cash Flow Blind


Only 12% of contractors get paid on time. Without real-time visibility, you‚Äôre always reacting, never anticipating.









Proactive Intelligence


Praevius (from Latin ‚Äúgoing before‚Äù) anticipates cost problems before they escalate. Connect your data once, get insights forever.




 Real-Time Tracking


Budget vs.¬†actual at a glance. Know your cost performance index the moment it changes.




 AI-Powered Reports


Generate variance reports in 2 minutes instead of 2 hours. Just ask for the report you need‚Äîthe AI handles the rest.




 AI Assistant


Tell it what you need in plain English. Create reports, track costs, approve variations‚Äîno training required.




 S-Curve Forecasting


See where your project is headed, not just where it‚Äôs been. EVM precision meets construction practicality.




 Seamless Integrations


Connect to Xero, QuickBooks, Sage, Google Drive, SharePoint‚Äîeven sync with Procore for GC collaboration.




 Mobile Ready


Update costs from the field. Approve variations on site. Real construction happens beyond the office.




 Voice Commands


Speak your requests on site. ‚ÄúShow me Project Alpha status‚Äù or ‚ÄúApprove the variation‚Äù‚Äîhands-free cost control.









Built for Your Business




 Trade Contractors


Electrical, mechanical, plumbing specialists with 10-50 employees. You need cost control that understands your world‚Äîvariations, retainage, progress claims.




 QS Professionals


Growing quantity surveying practices serving multiple clients. Professional tools that scale with your workload without enterprise complexity.









Simple, Transparent Pricing


Start free, upgrade as you grow. No per-user fees, no hidden costs.




Free


Free



Up to 3 projects


1 team member


Core cost tracking


Start Free



Essential


$99/month



Up to 10 projects


Up to 3 team members


Google Drive Sync


1 accounting integration


Start Free Trial



Professional


$229/month



Up to 25 projects


Up to 10 team members


All integrations


Claude AI Reports


Start Free Trial



Scale


$449/month



Unlimited projects


Unlimited team members


Claude AI Reports


Procore / SharePoint Sync


Start Free Trial








Ready to See Costs Before They Spiral?


Start your free trial today. Experience AI-powered cost control built specifically for construction professionals.


 Start Free Trial

30-day free trial. No credit card required.








Praevius is the cost control intelligence layer of the BIM Takeoff ecosystem. 20 years of construction expertise, now powered by AI.

title: Praevius Analytics Setup Guide
text:
Quick Start Checklist

Create Google Tag Manager account and container
Get GTM Container ID (GTM-XXXXXXX)
Create Google Analytics 4 property
Get GA4 Measurement ID (G-XXXXXXXXXX)
Update includes/gtm-head.html with your GTM Container ID
Update includes/gtm-body.html with your GTM Container ID
Add Google Search Console verification code
Run quarto render to build the site
Deploy and verify tracking in GTM Preview mode
Publish GTM container

title: Praevius Analytics Setup Guide
text:
Step 1: Google Tag Manager Setup

1.1 Create GTM Account

Go to tagmanager.google.com
Click Create Account
Fill in:

Account Name: Praevius or your company name
Country: United Kingdom

Container Name: praevius.app
Target Platform: Web
Accept Terms of Service



1.2 Get Your Container ID
After creation, note your Container ID (format: GTM-XXXXXXX)


1.3 Update Include Files
Edit /Users/robertkowalski/Documents/praevius-website/includes/gtm-head.html:
Replace GTM-XXXXXXX with your actual Container ID in this line:
})(window,document,'script','dataLayer','GTM-XXXXXXX');</script>
Edit /Users/robertkowalski/Documents/praevius-website/includes/gtm-body.html:
Replace GTM-XXXXXXX with your actual Container ID:
<noscript><iframe src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/ns.html?id=GTM-XXXXXXX"

title: Praevius Analytics Setup Guide
text:
Step 2: Google Analytics 4 Setup

2.1 Create GA4 Property

Go to analytics.google.com
Click Admin (gear icon)
Click Create > Property
Fill in:

Property Name: Praevius - Production
Reporting Time Zone: United Kingdom
Currency: British Pound (GBP)

Business details:

Industry: Technology
Size: Small or Medium




2.2 Create Data Stream

Select Web platform
Website URL: https://praevius.app
Stream Name: Praevius Website
Enable all Enhanced Measurement options
Note your Measurement ID (format: G-XXXXXXXXXX)



2.3 Configure GA4 in GTM
In GTM:

Go to Tags > New
Tag Configuration: Google Analytics: GA4 Configuration
Measurement ID: Enter your G-XXXXXXXXXX
Trigger: All Pages
Name: GA4 - Config - Praevius
Save

OR Import the container:

Go to Admin > Import Container
Select /includes/gtm-container-export.json
Choose workspace
Select Merge > Rename conflicting
Update the ‚ÄúGA4 Measurement ID‚Äù variable with your ID

title: Praevius Analytics Setup Guide
text:
Step 3: Conversion Tracking Events

Events Tracked Automatically
The analytics-events.html file automatically tracks:








Event
Description
Parameters




view_pricing
Pricing page visit
page_path, referrer


view_features
Features page visit
page_path


free_trial_click
Trial button clicks
cta_text, cta_location, plan_interest


demo_request_click
Demo button clicks
cta_location


contact_click
Contact button clicks
cta_location


cta_click
General CTA clicks
cta_text, cta_url, cta_location


contact_form_started
Form interaction begins
form_id, form_location


contact_form_submitted
Form submission
form_id, form_location


scroll_depth
Scroll milestones (25/50/75/90%)
scroll_percentage


chatbot_opened
Pipedrive chat opened
chatbot_type


outbound_link_click
External link clicks
link_url, link_text





Mark Events as Conversions in GA4

In GA4, go to Admin > Events
Wait for events to appear (24-48 hours after first occurrence)
Toggle Mark as conversion for:

free_trial_click
demo_request
contact_form_submitted

title: Praevius Analytics Setup Guide
text:
Step 4: Google Search Console

4.1 Add Property

Go to search.google.com/search-console
Click Add Property
Choose URL prefix
Enter: https://praevius.app



4.2 Verify Ownership
Option A: HTML Meta Tag (Recommended)

Select ‚ÄúHTML tag‚Äù verification
Copy the verification code
Edit /includes/gtm-head.html
Replace YOUR_VERIFICATION_CODE with your code:

<meta name="google-site-verification" content="YOUR_ACTUAL_CODE" />
Option B: DNS TXT Record

Select ‚ÄúDomain name provider‚Äù
Add TXT record to your DNS:

Type: TXT
Host: @ or praevius.app
Value: google-site-verification=YOUR_CODE




4.3 Connect to GA4

In GA4: Admin > Product Links > Search Console Links
Click Link
Select your Search Console property
Submit



4.4 Submit Sitemap
Add sitemap generation to _quarto.yml (if not already present):
website:
  site-url: "https://praevius.app"
  # ... other config
The sitemap will be at https://praevius.app/sitemap.xml
In Search Console: 1. Go to Sitemaps 2. Enter: sitemap.xml 3. Click Submit

title: Praevius Analytics Setup Guide
Praevius Analytics Setup Guide
text:
Step 6: Build and Deploy

6.1 Render the Site
cd /Users/robertkowalski/Documents/praevius-website
quarto render


6.2 Verify Files
Check that GTM code is present in output:
grep -l "googletagmanager" docs/*.html


6.3 Deploy
git add .
git commit -m "Add Google Tag Manager and analytics tracking"
git push

title: Praevius Analytics Setup Guide
text:
Step 7: Testing and Verification

7.1 GTM Preview Mode

In GTM, click Preview
Enter: https://praevius.app
Navigate around the site
Check that tags fire correctly



7.2 GA4 DebugView

In GA4: Admin > DebugView
Browse your site with GTM Preview active
Verify events appear in real-time



7.3 Chrome Extensions
Install these for testing: - Tag Assistant Legacy (by Google) - GA Debugger - dataLayer Inspector+


7.4 Common Issues







Issue
Solution




Tags not firing
Check GTM container is published


Events not in GA4
Verify Measurement ID is correct


Search Console not verified
Wait 24-48 hours, check meta tag placement


Clarity not loading
Check project ID, ensure no ad blockers

title: Praevius Analytics Setup Guide
text:
Step 8: Publish GTM Container
Once testing is complete:

In GTM: Click Submit
Add version name: Initial Analytics Setup
Add description of changes
Click Publish

title: Praevius Analytics Setup Guide
text:
Event Reference

Data Layer Events
These events are pushed to dataLayer by analytics-events.html:
// CTA Click
{
  'event': 'cta_click',
  'cta_text': 'Start Free Trial',
  'cta_url': 'https://app.praevius.app/start-trial',
  'cta_location': 'hero',
  'page_url': 'https://praevius.app/',
  'page_path': '/',
  'timestamp': '2025-12-31T12:00:00.000Z'
}

// Free Trial Click
{
  'event': 'free_trial_click',
  'cta_text': 'Start Free Trial',
  'cta_url': 'https://app.praevius.app/start-trial?bundle=professional',
  'cta_location': 'pricing_section',
  'plan_interest': 'professional',
  'page_url': 'https://praevius.app/pricing.html',
  'page_path': '/pricing.html',
  'timestamp': '2025-12-31T12:00:00.000Z'
}

// Form Submitted
{
  'event': 'contact_form_submitted',
  'form_id': 'contact-form',
  'form_location': 'body',
  'page_url': 'https://praevius.app/contact.html',
  'page_path': '/contact.html',
  'timestamp': '2025-12-31T12:00:00.000Z'
}

title: Construction Cost Control Features | Real-Time Tracking & AI Insights | Praevius
text:
Construction Cost Control Features: Real-Time Tracking & AI Insights

From real-time tracking to AI-powered forecasting. One platform, complete visibility.







Your AI Assistant


No menus to learn. No training required. Just tell Praevius what you need in plain English‚Äîor speak it on site.




Just Ask



‚ÄúShow me projects over budget‚Äù


‚ÄúGenerate variance report for Project Alpha‚Äù


‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs the CPI on the hospital job?‚Äù


‚ÄúApprove the steel variation‚Äù





AI Handles the Rest



 Instant dashboards & reports


 Voice commands from the field


 Permission-aware actions


 Confirmation for critical tasks










Core Capabilities




 Real-Time Budget Tracking


See your budget vs.¬†actual costs the moment data changes. No more waiting for month-end reports to discover problems. Dashboard views show project health at a glance with traffic-light status indicators.



Live cost performance index (CPI)


Budget consumption tracking


Variance alerts and thresholds


Multi-project portfolio view





 AI-Powered Reporting


Just ask for the report you need‚Äîthe AI handles the rest. Generate professional variance reports in minutes, not hours. Plain English explanations of the ‚Äúwhy‚Äù behind your numbers.



Automated variance explanations


Trend analysis and forecasting


Executive summary generation


Export to PDF, Word, or share live





 S-Curve Forecasting


Earned Value Management made practical. See where your project is headed, not just where it‚Äôs been. Plan interventions before problems escalate.



Planned vs.¬†actual vs.¬†forecast curves


Schedule Performance Index (SPI)


Estimate at Completion (EAC) projections


What-if scenario modeling





 Change Order Management


Track every variation from inception to approval to payment. Never leave money on the table again. Change orders account for 8-14% of project costs‚Äîcapture them all.



Variation register with status tracking


Automated entitlement flagging


Impact assessment tools


Approval workflow automation





 Progress Claim Automation


Generate accurate progress claims in minutes. Centralized dashboard eliminates hunting through spreadsheets and rechecking every line item manually.



Schedule of values tracking


Percentage complete calculations


Retainage management


Claim history and audit trail





 Seamless Integrations


Connect to the tools you already use. Praevius syncs with accounting, storage, and project management platforms for a single source of truth.



Xero, QuickBooks, Sage


Google Drive, SharePoint, OneDrive


Procore (for GC collaboration)


Open API for custom connections










Coming Soon




 Voice Commands


Speak your requests on the jobsite. ‚ÄúShow me Project Alpha‚Äù or ‚ÄúApprove the variation‚Äù‚Äîhands-free cost control that works in noisy environments.




 Native Mobile App


Beyond responsive web‚Äîa true native experience. Offline capability, camera integration for documentation, push notifications for approvals.




 Predictive Analytics


AI that learns from your historical data to predict likely cost overruns before they happen. Early warning, not post-mortem.









Industry-Standard Variance Indicators


Instant project health visibility using the traffic light system every construction professional understands.



 On Budget

Variance within +/-5%. Project performing as planned. Continue current trajectory.



 Watch

Variance 5-10%. Early warning. Investigate and plan corrective action.



 Over Budget

Variance exceeds 10%. Immediate attention required. Intervention needed.









Ready to Take Control?


Start your free trial and experience all features.

 Start Free Trial

Frequently Asked




Is there a free plan?


Yes! Our Free plan lets you track up to 3 projects with 1 team member. Upgrade anytime as your needs grow.




Are there any per-user fees?


No.¬†Each plan includes a set number of users, and our Scale plan includes unlimited users. No hidden per-seat charges.




Can I change plans later?


Absolutely. Upgrade or downgrade anytime. Changes take effect immediately, with prorated billing adjustments.




What about annual billing?


Pay annually and save 17%. Contact us for annual billing options.




What‚Äôs included in support?


Essential: Email support (48hr response). Professional: Priority email (24hr response). Scale: Dedicated success manager + phone support.




How does Praevius compare to Procore?


Praevius is built specifically for subcontractors and QS professionals, with simpler pricing and no per-user fees. Professional-grade cost control at mid-market pricing.









Need Enterprise Features?


Large subcontractors and QS firms with complex requirements can discuss custom plans including SSO, advanced security, custom integrations, and SLA guarantees.

Talk to Sales






30-Day Money Back Guarantee


If Praevius doesn‚Äôt save you time and money in your first month, we‚Äôll refund your payment. No questions asked. We‚Äôre that confident.

 Start Free Trial

title: About Praevius | AI Cost Control for Construction Subcontractors
text:
About Praevius: AI Cost Control for Construction Subcontractors

20 years of construction cost management expertise, now powered by AI.







The Story



Praevius (from Latin ‚Äúpraevius‚Äù meaning ‚Äúgoing before‚Äù) was born from a simple observation: construction subcontractors are drowning in spreadsheets while enterprise platforms price them out of modern cost control.


After two decades working as a quantity surveyor across the UK, Australia, and Poland‚Äîhandling everything from 500K fitouts to 50M commercial developments‚Äîthe pattern became undeniable. Specialty trade contractors, the backbone of every construction project, were consistently:



Losing 3-5% margins to poor variation tracking


Wasting 10+ hours monthly on manual billing cycles


Discovering cost overruns weeks after they could have acted


Being priced out of tools designed for general contractors



Praevius is the solution: professional-grade cost control without enterprise complexity. Simple enough to learn in hours, powerful enough to replace spreadsheet chaos.








Our Philosophy




 Proactive, Not Reactive


The best cost control happens before problems arise. Praevius anticipates variances, flags anomalies, and surfaces insights‚Äîso you can act, not just react.




 Built for Construction


Not accounting software with construction labels. Every feature designed around real QS workflows: progress claims, variations, retainage, percentage complete.




 AI as Assistant


AI enhances your expertise, it doesn‚Äôt replace it. Specific, measurable outcomes‚Äînot vague promises. You make the decisions; Praevius handles the grunt work.









Part of BIM Takeoff




 BIM Takeoff


Professional BIM 5D cost estimation and quantity surveying services. 20 years of international experience across UK, Australia, and Poland. Delivering quantity takeoffs with +/-5% accuracy in 3-10 days.

Visit BIM Takeoff



 Praevius.app


The cost control intelligence layer. Where BIM Takeoff delivers project-specific expertise, Praevius provides the ongoing visibility and control that keeps projects profitable.

Start Free Trial








Ready to Work Smarter?


Start your free trial today. Experience construction cost control done right.

 Start Free Trial
